post.body: Mucxh much better than blog comments. No nutters going on at endless length, but good input instead
Eddie! Welcome aboard to the captain. HH
Only if the conservatives embrace the various platforms
Drop rob@kithbridge.com a note urging the set-up. Hopefully it won't take much time.
That's not a high hurdle, and Langella crossed it very very easily. Stone's Nixon was a joke. This is very good.
Heh. Welcome. Hugh
Hi Colonel: Indeed we did. Sounds like a fun trip. Col . Marc Breslau was filling me in. He wants to go as well
Thank you! You changed a life tonight. #hhrs
#hhrs He's so wrong perry, so wrong. The jawas/tribbles are a happy bunch
Thanks for helping old fighter pilot @jtCook and the former Los Angeles Times reporter @williamlobdell #hhrs #tcot
#hhrs Moses needs a job, not a wife, though eventually he'll need one of those as well. $15 an hour. Great worker. Great kid too.
Hi carl: All Browns fans should twitter in anticipation of the draft
Welcome ttemucula! Thansk for listening!
#hhrs JG: Do not covet Parcells. He belongs in Cleveland.
No. I am very skeptical that is on the agenda
#hhrs Coach: So is the Fetching Mrs. Hewitt! I am flying through Vince Flynn from start to finish for an early '09 interview
Oops. Don't let her know.
Thanks for giving us a try! Hugh
#hhrs What an organization and what a fine salute to Corporal Rubin last night. Do you folks have a web site?
@hhrs Thanks for all the GolfGym folk do for frogfriends.com. HH
You are a better man than I
#hhrs This is called Plan Laurenitis, modeled on Plan LeBron of a few years back
#hhrs With the signing of Kerry Wood, the Tribe is ready for '09, and the city is ready for for a big three sweeps: Cavs, Tribe and Browns.
#tcot #hhrs Perhaps TCOT could run a poll of its members on the RNC chairmanship --data on which candidate has the most wired support?
#hhrs Saw FrostNixon with @EOTUE. Langella's Best Actor. I worked with RN from late '78 to fall '80, and Langella's portrayal is superb.
Offto see Frost and Nixon. #hhrs
Blackwell and Steele have the advantage of actually having run for office. Does that matter? #hhrs
#hhrs #tcot Six interviews later --all linked at HughHewitt.com-- I don't have a sense of who will win RNC. Thoughts? Mostlikely? Least?

This weekend I'll be kicking around the RNC Chair race here via hastag #hhrs. Perhaps some of the candidates will join us? #tcot

#hhrs From a federal prosecutor: Once Blago is indicted, he gets all the tapes, including those with Rahm. That's leverage. Think leaks.
